19namespace Valve.VR.InteractionSystem

24 public class ContactPoint : MonoBehaviour
25 {
29 public Cutter cutter;
30
35 private void OnTriggerExit(Collider other)
36 {
37 var sliceable = other.gameObject.GetComponent<Sliceable>();
38 if (sliceable)
39 {
40 cutter.Cut(transform, sliceable);
41 }
42 }
43 }

Valve.VR.InteractionSystem.ContactPoint
This class represents a contact point on a Cutter object that interacts with sliceable objects.

Valve.VR.InteractionSystem.ContactPoint.OnTriggerExit
void OnTriggerExit(Collider other)
Check if the exiting object has a Sliceable component and call the cutter's Cut method if found.
